ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] EasterQuest!
ygData.msgSnippet: hehehe nice! ... From: Talies the Wanderer  To:  Sent: Sunday, April 23, 2000 2:54 PM Subject: [eqbards]
ygData.messageBody:
hehehe nice!
----- Original Message -----
From: "Talies the Wanderer" <snicker@...>
To: <Recipient list suppressed>
Sent: Sunday, April 23, 2000 2:54 PM
Subject: [eqbards] EasterQuest!


> Happy Easter, everyone! Just in time for this wonderful holiday, I
present
> to you a website dedicated to all the little inside jokes, pop-culture
> references, and humourous oddities - in other words, the Easter Eggs of
> Everquest. I call the site EasterQuest! Warning!!! There are some
> spoilers, so if you don't want to be spoiled like last years eggs that
were
> never found (ewwwww....) don't stop by. For the rest of you:
>
> Onward to Easterquest!
(http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/everquest/easterquest.htm)
>
> Talies the Wanderer
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Good friends, school spirit, hair-dos you'd like to forget.
> Classmates.com has them all. And with 4.4 million alumni already
> registered, there's a good chance you'll find your friends here:
> http://click.egroups.com/1/2885/7/_/451022/_/956515964/
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
